modules.description: Provides asynchronous rendering and event handling for graphical elements using OCaml's Graphics library. Operates on pixel buffers, shapes, and window events to enable non-blocking visual updates. Enables real-time animation and interactive graphics without freezing the main thread.

The module provides window management, 2D drawing of geometric primitives and text, color manipulation, and event handling, operating on pixel coordinates, geometric shapes, and screen buffers. It supports interactive applications with features like mouse/keyboard input, audio integration, and screen synchronization to enhance visual rendering. Use cases include creating animations, graphical interfaces, and real-time visualizations with controlled drawing behavior and flicker reduction.
